title: Is in campus hostel a better option than an outside PG for amity university noida? - Quora
tags: College and University Advice in India

response.answer_text: In campus hostel of Amity University are certainly good option for students but due to large number of enrolments every year they are not able to meet the requirements of all outstation students. Even students living in Delhi NCR prefer to get an accommodation near Amity University to save time and energy that goes into travelling to the campus. For students who wish to stay near Amity University but are not able to register a room at in-campus hostel, Placio is a decent professionally managed student living option in Noida. It provides modern facilities combined with student-targeted amenities. Student residents also get access to helpline numbers for emergencies whether medical or non-medical in nature and a customer helpline number to resolve grievances, if any. Placio even provides a Parents Helpline. It is a safe and independent student housing experience innovated for Amity University students.

If you can afford then you should definitely stay some time in private PGs outside the college as they have less/no restrictions and great living experience. One such housing facility that i know of is Students Inn. There are a number of hostels, PGs and accomodation facilities near Amity University and the best reviews I've heard from my friends are about Students Inn housing properties. They have a lot of facilities for recreation like gym, sports, gaming zone with full security and 4 times meals. They have house keeping, laundry and ironing facilities. Also, each room had it's personal TV with Netflix and Tata sky and unlimited WiFi. I personally stayed there too for 2 months even though i lived very close to the college and the experience was amazing. I'd highly recommend Students Inn to anyone looking for luxury accommodation.
